Whereas now- adays even articles of food and drink have to be protected against theft by means of 3 ring: this is the progress achieved by our legions of slaves—a foreign rabble in one's home, so that an attendant to tell people's names now has to be employed even in the case of one's slaves! This was not the way with by—gone generations, when 3 single servant for each master, 3 member of his master’s clan, Marcius's boy or Lucius's boy, took all his meals with the family in common, nor was there any need of precautions in the home to keep watch on the domestics.
